body_html: You can run your script with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=5,6 python your_script.py or set the environment variable in the script by os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = '5,6' to map GPU 5, 6 to device_ids 0, 1, respectively.
body_text: You can run your script with CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=5,6 python your_script.py or set the environment variable in the script by os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = '5,6' to map GPU 5, 6 to device_ids 0, 1, respectively.
body: You can run your script with `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=5,6 python your_script.py` or set the environment variable in the script by `os.environ['CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES'] = '5,6'` to map GPU 5, 6 to device_ids 0, 1, respectively.
